name: Kitty Lander
description:
Take control of the agile Kitty Lander and save as many kitties as you can! A simple two button control scheme makes flying the lander easy to learn but hard to master. Develop your skills and become the best pilot ever seen. Are you up to the challenge?

Featuring:
• Retro graphics and sound
• Easy learning that has you flying in seconds
• Challenging and addicting gameplay
• Achievements and global leaderboards
• No pay to win scheme
